title: Purifies Air
description: Indoor plants remove toxins and improve air quality, making your home healthier.

title: Reduces Stress
description: Being around greenery reduces stress and anxiety, and boosts your mood.

title: Boosts Productivity
description: Having plants in your workspace improves focus, creativity, and productivity.

title: Improves Humidity
description: Plants release moisture into the air, which is great for your skin and respiratory system.

title: Aesthetic Appeal
description: Indoor plants add beauty, color, and life to your home decor.
